about_the_game:
Skyrider is a fun and relaxing endless runner. Attempt a highscore, challenges, or just explore an endless procedural futuristic city. Complete challenges to earn credits, which can be spent on character cosmetics.

Features:
-Endless procedural city
-3 Unique zones (each with unique buildings)
-3 Endless Challenges
-Simple Character Editor
-Day/Night change
-A few fun voice lines, with subtitles

Gameplay:
Move the character left and right to wall-run and jump to the next building. Avoid hitting the ground, which will reset the round.
Line the character up with the side of a wall to wall-ride. The character will automatically jump at the end of the wall.

Controls:
The controls are very simple: "A" and "D" move the character left and right.

This is the first game that this developer has published, so we apologize for any rough edges.
If the game becomes popular, we might consider further developing the game. More challenges, characters, environment detail and other features like a grapple hook, abilities, & more.

name: Sky Rider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should work on most machines. Not very graphically intensive.

short_description: Skyrider is a fun and relaxing endless runner. Attempt a highscore, challenges, or simply enjoy the atmosphere of an endless futuristic city. Complete challenges to earn credits, which can be spent on character cosmetics.
